content:
On March 25, 2024 in the Kherson region, a 711-year-old man was discovered from the Kherson region on March 25, 2024 after the shelling of the Russian invaders.

This is said inmessageOffice of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine.

According to preliminary data, he died due to the discharge of explosives from the drone.

On March 25, the Russian invaders fired at Kherson and the de -industrial settlements of the region.

According to preliminary data, the enemy beat from artillery, RSZV, drones and aviation.

Damaged residential buildings, outbuildings, administrative buildings, car.

Under the procedural guidance of the prosecutor's office of the Kherson region, a pre -trial investigation in criminal proceedings on violation of the laws and customs of war (Part 1 of Article 438 of the Criminal Code of Ukraine) was launched.

As reported by the Armyinform, on March 25, 2024 as a result of a hostile blow to the Vovchansk Kharkiv regionThe man was killed.
title: In the Kherson region after the Russian shelling found a fallen resident
description: This is stated in the office of the Prosecutor General of Ukraine. By the previous ...
author: Army Inform
